trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> that holds the content of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Ger en <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> som innehåller innehållet i en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: An XpsDocument contains a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> that comprises one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements.
trans-unit.target: En XpsDocument innehåller en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>som består av en eller flera <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>element.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor is passed a reference to a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>konstruktorn skickas en referens till en <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>för skrivning, lagra och läsa innehåll element i dokumentet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is created by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En ny tom [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>skapas med hjälp av den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is opened by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: En befintlig [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>öppnas med hjälp av den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>rot har lagts till i en tom [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>genom att anropa den <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, or on individual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements that are stored in the XpsDocument.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>element med information om skrivare och kontroll kan också associeras med den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, eller på individuella <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>och <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>element som är lagrade i XpsDocument.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence></xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] finns XML Paper Specification (XPS) tillgänglig för hämtning på [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class with access to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> klass med åtkomst till en angiven [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> och standardalternativ för interfoliering, resurser och komprimering.

trans-unit.source: The target [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Målet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] för den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> klassen som finns i en angiven <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> anges med standardalternativen för interfoliering, resurser och komprimering.

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mål-paketet för den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: Komprimeringsalternativet för paketet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> klassen som finns i en angiven <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> fil med standardalternativen för interfoliering, resurser och komprimering.

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sökvägen och filnamnet för mål <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> för den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -I/o-filläge att öppna den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with the specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> klassen som finns i en angiven <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> med angivna interfoliering, resurser och komprimering standardalternativ.

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mål-paketet för den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: Komprimeringsalternativet för paketet.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document as a string.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] för dokumentet som en sträng.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> klassen som finns i en angiven <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> fil med standardalternativen för interfoliering, resurser och komprimering.

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sökvägen och filnamnet för mål <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> för den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -I/o-filläge att öppna den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: Komprimeringsalternativet för paketet.

trans-unit.source: Adds a root <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> to the package and returns a writer.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en rot <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> till paketet och returnerar en skrivare.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Även om den här klassen använder ett enda namn, en <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>kan vara en uppsättning (sekvens) en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>eller flera dokument.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] fixed-document sequence writer for this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] fast dokumentet sekvens-skrivaren för detta <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a thumbnail image to the package.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en miniatyrbild för paketet.

trans-unit.source: The format of the image.
trans-unit.target: Formatet på bilden.

trans-unit.source: The newly added <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den nyligen tillagda <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Closes the XPS document <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stänger XPS-dokumentet <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>har öppnats för skrivning, data buffertar skrivs till arkivet och fysiska dokumentet <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>är stängd.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: After Close has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Efter Stäng har anropats, inga delar av dokumentet kan användas med den här <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>instans.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Gets the core <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"></xref> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar grundläggande <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"> </xref> av den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: The core properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref><xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grundläggande egenskaper för den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref> for writing an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"> </xref> för att skriva en <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to write.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokument för att skriva.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref> to use for writing the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"> </xref> ska användas för skrivning av [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> and optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Släpper de ohanterade resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> och du kan också släpper hanterade resurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas av allmänheten `Dispose()` metod och <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metod.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`anropar den skyddade `Dispose(Boolean)` metod med den `disposing` parametern `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>anropar `Dispose` med `disposing` inställd på `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> references.
trans-unit.target: När den `disposing` parametern är true, den här metoden Frigör alla resurser som innehas av alla hanterade objekt som den här <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>referenser.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden startar den `Dispose()` metod för varje refererade till objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både hanterade och ohanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att släppa endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref> för att läsa dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Även om den här klassen använder ett enda namn, en <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>kan vara en uppsättning (sekvens) en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>eller flera dokument.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref> för att läsa dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fixed-document sequence at the root of the package.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar fast dokumentet sekvensen i roten på paketet.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Även om den här klassen använder ett enda namn, en <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>kan vara en uppsättning (sekvens) en <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>eller flera dokument.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> of the package.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> av paketet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is readable.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om paketet är läsbar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package is readable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om paketet är läsbart; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package can be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om paketet kan signeras digitalt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package can be signed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om paketet kan signeras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is writable.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om paketet är skrivbar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package is writable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om paketet är skrivbar; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a signature from the package.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort en signatur från paketet.

trans-unit.source: The signature that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen som tas bort.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en samling [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] som är associerad med paketet.

trans-unit.source: The Signatures list identifies what parts are signed and whether the signatures are valid.
trans-unit.target: Listan över signaturer identifierar vilka delar är signerade och om signaturer är giltiga.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> objects that represent the signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> objekt som representerar signaturer som är associerad med paketet.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Loggar en samling av paketdelar med en angiven X.509-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Om `certificate` är `null`, visas en dialogruta där användaren att välja ett installerat X.509-certifikat som från en smartkortsläsare.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikat för användning i logga varje del; eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> att uppmana användaren att välja ett installerat certifikat.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>certifikatet ska lagras i paketet. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts must be excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Flaggor som anger vilka beroende delar måste undantas från den signering.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> som innehåller information om signaturen.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Loggar paketdelar som är en samling med ett angivet X.509-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Om `certificate` är `null`, visas en dialogruta där användaren att välja ett installerat X.509-certifikat som från en smartkortsläsare.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikat för användning i logga varje del; eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> att uppmana användaren att välja ett installerat certifikat.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>certifikatet ska lagras i paketet. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts are excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Flaggor som anger vilka beroende delar är undantagna från den signering.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] tilldela signaturen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> som innehåller information om signaturen.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Loggar en samling av paketdelar med en angiven X.509-certifikat.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box is presented that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Om `certificate` är `null`, en dialogruta där användaren att välja ett installerat X.509-certifikat som från en smartkortsläsare.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if `certificate` is `null` and no certificates are installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>genereras om `certificate` är `null` och inga certifikat har installerats.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509-certifikat för användning i logga varje del; eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> att uppmana användaren att välja ett installerat certifikat.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>certifikatet ska lagras i paketet. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts to exclude from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Flaggor som anger vilka beroende delar om du vill exkludera från även signering.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] tilldela signaturen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to verify that <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> before signing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Kontrollera att <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*>är <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> innan du registrerar; annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> som innehåller information om signaturen.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Den här medlemmen stöder den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastrukturen och är inte avsedd att användas direkt från din kod.

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Använd typ-säkert <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*>metod i stället.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] miniatyrbilden som är kopplad till dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref> that represents the thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref> som representerar miniatyrbilden som är kopplad till dokumentet.
